Most of the data and figures in this repository were prepared for the publication *Segregation Surfaces*, D. J. Hunter and C. Warioba, Mathematics Magazine 94:3, June 2021, pp. 163--172.

- [https://doi.org/10.1080/0025570X.2021.1908044](https://doi.org/10.1080/0025570X.2021.1908044)
- [2022 MAA Allendorfer Award](https://www.maa.org/sites/default/files/Awards/Allendoerfer_Hunter_Warioba.pdf)
